title: GitHub Release from Tag (Configuration)
description: Configuration for the "GitHub Release from Tag" GitHub Action. ðŸ˜‰

generateAssets.description: Set to false to disable generation of checksum assets for releases.

discussion.description: Options for creating discussions linked to releases.

category.description: The category to use when creating the discussion. The value must be a category that already exists in the repository.

reactions.description: Reactions to create for discussions linked to releases.

items.description: A reaction to create for discussions linked to releases.

draft.description: Set to true to produce releases in a draft state.

generateReleaseNotes.description: Set to true to append automatically generated release notes to release bodies.

prerelease.description: Set to true or false to override the automatic tag name based pre-release detection.

items.description: A reaction to create for releases.

summary.description: Options for creating GitHub Actions job summaries.

enabled.description: Set to false to disable GitHub Actions job summary creation.
